QuestData.Title: Vigilance on Wings
QuestData.Description: The agents of Twilight continue their assault within this pocket of the Firelands. We must not let our offensive fall! Take wing, and destroy as many of those lancers as you can!$b$bDo not forget to pick up and equip your lance first.
QuestData.LogDescription: Equip a Twilight Firelance and fly Aviana's Guardian. Kill 10 Twilight Lancers by flying into them. Press the flap button to flap your mount's wings!
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $c. I hope you don't forget about us here in the Hatchery.
